subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: As a coach of sprinters, John Smith has had huge success. In the last 22 years, first as an assistant at U.C.L.A. and now as the full-time head coach of the club HSI (Hudson Smith International), he has turned out Olympic and world champions.
snippet: As a coach of sprinters, John Smith has had huge success. In the last 22 years, first as an assistant at U.C.L.A. and now as the full-time head coach of the club HSI (Hudson Smith International), he has turned out Olympic and world champions.
